thread.section_title: Words Anywhere Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Words Anywhere | www.wordsanywhere.com | 4 of 140
thread.title: DB

author: DB
title: DB
text:
Delivery service was absolutely fantastic - FAST! And to think the parcel came all the way from the States. Takes longer to come across a couple of Canadian provinces which certainly doesn't say much for our postal service. Product was beautiful and very easy to put on the wall. I definitely know where to go if I should need further lettering and won't hesitate to let family and friends know as well.
Thank you so much.
